::Torca gets tired of waiting for the two happy bots and looks around inside 
again. He finally runs into Depth Charge::
Torca: Depth Charge, I need your help!
Depth Charge: For what?
Torca: There's a big battle going on at the ark, and we need all the Maximals 
we can get!
Depth Charge: Will Rampage be there?
Torca: I dont know but, the ark'll be destroyed if we dont get there soon!
Depth Charge: I'm there!
::They walk to the CR chambers.  Bluestreak walks out at that moment::
Bluestreak: I'm ready to kick some alliance butt!
::They see the Sniper is in the next CR chamber::
Torca: Lets wait for him.
::They stand there waiting for him to be healed::
